description: Verilog 2005 has been superseded by SystemVerilog, which builds off the previous standard but adds new design modeling features. SystemVerilog source files have an .SV file extension.
NOTE: Verilog source files are saved in a plain text format and can be opened in a text editor such as Notepad++.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .v file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
images.caption: V file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
